title: Wedding Invitation Font
content:
This font is listed as True Love from Checkerboard. Does anyone know the correct name?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Invitation%20Font_5107.jpg)
  
Thank You for all of your help! I've been trying to figure it out for 3 weeks!

Font: 

 DomLovesMary 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202834/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: papernerd

comments.content:
I could not find this in any of my font books. Scripts are one of my 'things', but I couldn't pin this one down.

Where is it from?

- Mike Yanega

p.s. can you delete the duplicate post of this?

Looks like: DomLovesMary by Brian Bonislawsky.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/correspondence-ink/dom-loves-mary/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202834/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/correspondence-ink/dom-loves-mary/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/correspondence-ink/dom-loves-mary/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jennifer1_6495.jpg)
Nice find, Dick. It's hard to believe the same fellow is behind [Astigmatic One Eye](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202834/http:/www.astigmatic.com/).
It is used by a stationery company for wedding invitations (Checkerboard). The script is called DomLovesMary Thanks for trying to help! Sorry about duplicate post - I'm a first-timer
